net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database

Class SQLitePortal.ConnectionTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.SQLitePortal.ConnectionTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SQLiteAssetPortal.ConnectionTask
    Enclosing class:
    SQLitePortal

    protected class SQLitePortal.ConnectionTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Allows the SQLitePortal to create a persistent connection to its underlying database on a background thread.
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.0.2 (#8)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SQLitePortal m_dbh
      A reference back to the SQLitePortal that needs the connection.
      protected SQLitePortal.ConnectionListener m_listener
      A listener to handle the connection callback, if any.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ConnectionTask()
      The default constructor.
      protected ConnectionTask(SQLitePortal.ConnectionListener l)
      A constructor which specifies a listener to receive the "on connected" callback.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run() 
      void runInBackground()
      Executes the task in the background.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • runInBackground

        public void runInBackground()
